description: C0GN1T0 Search Logic & Brute Syntax Library

philosophy.explanation: Do not search for the answer. Search for the document that CONTAINS the answer. Precision queries exclude valid sources. 'Aboutness' queries capture the container.

example.bad: Nvidia Q3 2024 data center revenue exact figure
example.reasoning: The exact figure is inside the report. Finding the report is easy; finding the figure in a snippet is unreliable.

strategies.name: Entity-First (Who/What)
strategies.condition: When looking for facts about a specific entity.
strategies.instruction: Focus on the ENTITY. Use specific operators to isolate them.

strategies.name: Terrain-First (Where)
strategies.condition: When the answer is likely in a specific type of document or location.
strategies.instruction: Define the TERRAIN first. Use filetype or site operators.

strategies.name: Archive-Deep (When)
strategies.condition: When the information is historical or deleted.
strategies.instruction: Use the Archive Operators to look backwards in time.

examples.user_goal: Find out if John Doe was sued in 2022.
examples.thought_process: Don't search 'John Doe lawsuit 2022'. That's too narrow. Search for John Doe in legal contexts.

examples.user_goal: Get the technical specs of the new Tesla GPU.
examples.thought_process: The specs are in the whitepaper or datashet. Search for the product + PDF.
